lines.text: That's not blood- it's tattoo ink! The same ink used to make the <c=#FF0000>Go Wizard</c> tattoos!
...Ain't those tattoos more orange than red?
Sure, if you dilute it in the skin.
But in its concentrated form, it's blood-red!
Kid, what would he be doing with that much tattoo ink?
Opening a tattoo ink store? Who cares?
It's- I'm not- it's not a- a forensic analysis, it's j-just. It smells like blood.
Well, fine! It's blood-scented tattoo ink!
Let's move on to a non-crazy idea.
